sys_script_include.name: u_getAccountName

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_ac7f5a5c2fbc59108968ea5ef699b6c4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.u_getAccountName</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>u_getAccountName</name><script><![CDATA[// create class
var u_getAccountName = Class.create();
u_getAccountName.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    //function name
    getAccountInfo: function() {

        // search parameter for query - got this from client script
        var accountNumber = this.getParameter('sysparm_accountNumber');

        //query
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_58872_needit_kfs_pinnacle');
        gr.addQuery('account_number', accountNumber);
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next()) {
            //return data
            return gr.account_name;
        }
    }

});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-16 05:09:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>ac7f5a5c2fbc59108968ea5ef699b6c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>u_getAccountName</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ac7f5a5c2fbc59108968ea5ef699b6c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-16 05:09:04</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
